EmailTemplate.name: 25AprilWeb-Presentations.Sorry We Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You - Resources from our Presentations Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our “Powerful Proposal Presentations: How to Influence Executives and Win the Project" webinar held on Thursday, April 25. Dave Underhill, Presentation Expert and founder of Underhill Training and Development, explained how independent consultants can present effectively to executives and win the contract. Below you will find links to the webinar resources. We hope you find them informative: Recorded webinar <http://video.mbopartners.com/players/EphkN4xd-mMm4x1IW.html> Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Powerful-Proposal-Presentations-Webinar.pdf> Webinar Q&A with Dave Underhill <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/presenting-executives-webinar-qa-dave-underhill> Continue the Discussion on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/groupItem?view=&gid=71161&type=member&item=230287522&qid=1cd59a89-54e1-4b9b-84b7-fb79411c151a&trk=group_most_popular-0-b-ttl&goback=%2Egmp_71161>
